Glad we got that confusion out of the way.

::Ramulus/Slayer::

Ramulus aproaches Prebon, stopping in the shade of a big tree a few dozen 
yards away. He looks at the Trainer, frowning.

"I have the map," he says, "But I don't see Striker anywhere with you. The 
deal was to have both hostages here."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
On his cliff, Slayer swears under his breath. Ramulus was behind a slagging 
tree. He moves a bit to the side, untill he comes to the edge of the cliff, 
but he still couldn't see the Maximal.

"Master," his internal computer (not his audio generators) transmits to 
Prebon, "THe Maximal is out of my line of fire. Do I blast down the 
obstacles?"
